document_data.name: Tarmuth
document_data.mainbody: '''Tarmuth''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: When the [[Castle Obarskyr/Hall of Justice|Hall of Justice]] became filled with deadly smoke on the day of the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, Tarmuth was one of the mages [[Glathra Barcantle]] commanded to rectify the situation. She told him to go after King [[Foril Obarskyr I]]'s bodyguard and warn all of them to put on ''[[night helm]]s''. He immediately ran off to do that.
